issue.title: [CF 99] a complete restart of wow needed
issue.body:
updated to current version, get a error when entering game same as below poster


> Posted by CurseForge user Digitspoc | Imported from CurseForge issue #99 | Raw

comments.body:

> Posted by CurseForge user Digitspoc

Same issue. TMW is disabled and does not work regardless of restarts.


> Posted by CurseForge user Froagh

Same issue for me too.

And a restart do nothing.

But when I log with a character with his own profil (not default so), all is ok and no restart pop-up.

Edited Jan 24, 2011

> Posted by CurseForge user Djidiouf

Yikes, sorry guys! While waiting for the fix to be approved, you can download v3.0.1 and run that, and then install 3.0.1a after that.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras

The fix is up. Enjoy!


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
